heading: Program Educational Objectives (PEO)
description: Educational objectives that prepare graduates for successful careers in business, management, and entrepreneurship.

sections.title: Program Educational Objectives (PEOs)
sections.description: Program Educational Objectives define the expected accomplishments of MBA graduates during the first few years after graduation.

items.title: Professional Excellence & Leadership
items.description: Graduates will demonstrate professional excellence in business management roles and emerge as effective leaders in corporate, entrepreneurial, or public sector organizations.

items.title: Strategic Thinking & Innovation
items.description: Graduates will apply strategic thinking, innovative approaches, and analytical tools to solve complex business problems and drive organizational growth.

items.title: Ethical & Responsible Management
items.description: Graduates will exhibit ethical business practices, social responsibility, and sustainable management approaches in their professional endeavors.

items.title: Entrepreneurship & Value Creation
items.description: Graduates will possess entrepreneurial capabilities to create new ventures, innovate business models, and generate value for stakeholders and society.

items.title: Continuous Learning & Adaptability
items.description: Graduates will engage in lifelong learning, stay updated with emerging business trends, and adapt to dynamic global business environments.

items.title: Effective Communication & Collaboration
items.description: Graduates will demonstrate excellent communication skills, build professional networks, and collaborate effectively in diverse and multicultural teams.
